price: Derler ki: “Bu fetih ne zaman olur, eğer doğru söyleyenler iseniz?”
arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَٰذَا ٱلۡفَتۡحُ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: wayaqūlūna matā hādhā al-fatḥu in kuntum ṣādiqīna
